mapper.sql: consume_id, work_id, material_id, consume_amount, consume_date, sender, receiver, note
mapper.select: SELECT consume.consume_id, consume.consume_amount, consume.consume_date, consume.sender, consume.receiver, consume.note, `work`.work_id,material.material_id FROM material_consume consume LEFT JOIN `work` ON consume.work_id= `work`.work_id LEFT JOIN material ON consume.material_id=material.material_id WHERE consume.consume_id LIKE #{consumeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT consume.consume_id, consume.consume_amount, consume.consume_date, consume.sender, consume.receiver, consume.note, `work`.work_id,material.material_id FROM material_consume consume LEFT JOIN `work` ON consume.work_id= `work`.work_id LEFT JOIN material ON consume.material_id=material.material_id WHERE consume.work_id LIKE #{workId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT consume.consume_id, consume.consume_amount, consume.consume_date, consume.sender, consume.receiver, consume.note, `work`.work_id,material.material_id FROM material_consume consume LEFT JOIN `work` ON consume.work_id= `work`.work_id LEFT JOIN material ON consume.material_id=material.material_id WHERE consume.material_id LIKE #{materialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into material_consume (consume_id, work_id, material_id, consume_amount, consume_date, sender, receiver, note) values (#{consumeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consumeAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{consumeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
